notesStmt.note: Editor's dedication signed "R.H.", i.e. Robert Hobson, to whom the whole is sometimes erroneously attributed. Also erroneously attributed to Robert Harris and to Robert Henderson.
With an additional title page, engraved, signed "Marten. discul", i.e. Martin Droeshout: "The arraignment of the whole creature att the barre of religion reason experience .. Anno 1632.".
